# Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit.day

**Case**

A subscription period unit of a day.

## Declaration

```swift
case day
```

## Getting the subscription period units

- **Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit.month**: A subscription period unit of a month.
- **Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit.week**: A subscription period unit of a week.
- **Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit.year**: A subscription period unit of a year.
